1. You are assuming everyone[.] parents are responsible, helping their children make choices, and acting in the child[.] best interest. These are privileges a large number of american children do not have. Some children[.] parents are in jail or have substance abuse problems. Some are dead. I am glad your parents made a choice for you and i hope their thinking pays off for you, honestly. For many people those decisions have ended disastrously for the student/child.

2. Lets explore it with a congressional committee then. Study the effects and see if it is worth it. Clearly the money would be better spent of loan forgiveness than on foreign wars for oil or subsidies to  profitable multinational corporations

3. Because we are in this together. Everyone should be encouraged to pursue the career of their passion. That creates an efficient economy that performs better for everyone. Not everyone can be an engineer or doctor. The humanities have true value. Sometimes those outside of the humanities can not perceive their value. There is an overwhelming world view taking over where everything is about producing "things", instead of producing "value" to a community. I like listening to music. I like seeing art at a museum. It adds meaning to my life and encourages me to work hard in my passion. It is about building a well rounded community.
